professional_summary: Experienced Network Administrator with expertise in virtualization, network maintenance, and problem-solving. Skilled in VMware, Cisco networking, and providing constructive solutions in a collaborative environment.

key_responsibilities: Daily maintenance of vCloud environment in production.
Providing solutions to clients for efficient lab use.
Resolving customer problems with network and server hardware/software.
Analyzing and testing network/server systems to eliminate issues.

work_experience.company: TOSHIBA (TOSHIBA GLOBAL COMMERCE SOLUTIONS) - Research Triangle Park, NC
key_responsibilities: Handling support requests from internal business partners.
Entering data from legacy systems to Oracle.
Managing contract headers and inventory data in ERP system.
